column2: "They say PSE Bursts happen when you keep fighting for a real long time."
"That's probably why I never get to see them. I mean, I basically work on my own and I always run away before battles even get started."
"I don't think I'll be seeing one any time soon, considering, so I can't help but feel like I'm missing out on something."
"Could you maybe do me a favor? The next time you experience a PSE Burst, could you collect some data on it?"
"It'll be super easy, 'cause all you have to do is experience it. The data gets collected automatically!"

"Defeating enemies stimulates the Photons in the atmosphere, which affects the abilities of ARKS operatives. This effect is known as PSE (Photon Sensitive Effect).

PSE can cause anything from a simple boost in abilities, to an increase in the amount of Meseta dropped, or extra experience from combat."

"There are eight levels of PSE, and the level rises as you continue to defeat enemies, enhancing the effect produced.

When a PSE reaches PSE level 8, a PSE Burst is triggered. This results in a dramatic stat boost due to the violent excitation of atmospheric Photons caused by cumulative PSEs."

"This effect only lasts for a limited time, but it can be extended by defeating enemies to keep Photons in a state of excitation.

A sign of some kind is given just before PSE is about to occur, so keep an eye out and utilize PSE to its best effect."
